I am Erdi, an engineer interested in web technologies and data sciences.

At Demirören Technology, I currently work on digital media sales platform. Before that I was working on news management and sales platform.

Prior to Demirören Technology; I was at Biges Inc. working on E-commerce platform(B2b). Before that I was working on access control and tracking system projects.

In my free time I try to learn something, contribute to open source and go hiking.
